js.ctimeseries_desc: This graph shows the evolution of the percentage of students that correctly solved each exercise.
js.ctimeseries_title: Users with at least one correct submission
js.label-undeletable: This label can't be deleted because it was set in the dirconfig file of a parent directory of the learning activity.
js.no_data: There is not enough data to create a graph.
js.no_selection: You must select at least one item before being able to download solutions.

series-admin-progress.plural: One user has completed %{index} activities |||| %{smart_count} users have completed %{index} activities
series-admin-progress.singular: One user has completed one activity |||| %{smart_count} users have completed one activity

saved_annotation.confirm_title_taken: This title is already taken. Are you sure you want to create another annotation with the same title?

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this saved comment?

form.annotation_text_help: Changes to this field will not impact existing comments.

input.edited: The current comment differs from the saved comment
input.help_html: Click here to manage all saved comments.
input.title: Reuse a saved comment

new.errors: %{count} errors prevented saving this comment for reuse
new.linked: This comment is linked to the saved comment: %{title}
new.title: Save comment for re-use

saved_annotation.title: Title

score.conflict: This score was already changed by another user
score.unknown: An unexpected error occured when saving the score

sign_in_search_bar.institution_search: Type to search for your institution

js.stacked_desc: This graph shows the distribution of submissions statuses.
js.submission-emoji: Oops, something went wrong while saving your solution. Your solution contains special symbols such as emoji or math characters that were probably copied from the problem description. Please remove them and try again. If you can't find the problem, contact the teaching assistant.
js.submission-failed: Oops, something went wrong while saving your solution. Reload this page, try again, or contact the teaching assistant.
js.submission-network: Oops, we're unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
js.submission-not-allowed: Oops, you are not allowed to submit a solution to this exercise.
js.submission-rate-limit: Oops, you're submitting too fast! Please wait a moment between each submission.
js.submission-too-long: Oops, something went wrong while saving your solution. Your solution is too long. Try to make it shorter and try again.

submission_motivational_message.1: Code-tastic! You just crushed that exercise like a bug! 🐛
submission_motivational_message.10: You did it! That programming exercise may have been tough, but you persevered.
submission_motivational_message.11: 👾 You've just defeated the Coding Boss! Level up, my friend!
submission_motivational_message.12: 💪 Code muscles getting stronger! Keep flexing those programming skills!
submission_motivational_message.13: 🎯 Bullseye! You hit the target with your coding precision. Well done!
submission_motivational_message.14: 🎓 You've just earned your honorary degree in Exercise Crushing! Congrats!
submission_motivational_message.15: Awesome job! You're proving yourself to be a talented programmer.
submission_motivational_message.16: 🌊 Surf's up, coder! You just rode that exercise like a pro!
submission_motivational_message.17: You're doing an excellent job! Keep pushing yourself to become an even better programmer.
submission_motivational_message.18: 🍪 A coding cookie for you! Enjoy the sweet taste of success!
submission_motivational_message.19: 🎮 You're a coding master! Keep coding and level up your skills!
submission_motivational_message.2: 🚀 Houston, we have a programmer! Great job on that exercise!
submission_motivational_message.20: Keep up the great work! You're becoming a skilled programmer with every exercise you complete.
submission_motivational_message.3: 💻 Code Whisperer alert! You're making that computer sing!
submission_motivational_message.31: Congratulations on your success! Your dedication and hard work are paying off.
submission_motivational_message.32: Fantastic job! You're getting closer to becoming a coding master.
submission_motivational_message.34: Keep up the momentum! You're on the right track with your programming studies.
submission_motivational_message.4: 🌟 You did it! Another exercise bites the dust! Keep rockin' that code!
submission_motivational_message.5: 🤖 Beep boop! You've impressed the robots with your coding skills!
submission_motivational_message.6: 🎉 Congratulations! You've just unlocked a new level in the coding game!
submission_motivational_message.7: Keep up the excellent work! You're mastering those programming skills.
submission_motivational_message.8: 👍 You're a coding superstar! Keep up the great work!
submission_motivational_message.9: 🔥 You're on fire! Keep up the great work and watch your coding skills soar!

js.timeseries_desc: This graph shows on which moments the students submitted the most solutions.
js.tutor-failed: Something went wrong while loading the online python tutor
js.unknown-error-loading-feedback: An unknown error occurred while loading the feedback for your submission

user_annotation.anonymous_message: This comment is part of an evaluation
user_annotation.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
user_annotation.help: Press Shift + Enter to send. Markdown is supported.
user_annotation.help_student: Our guide provides more information about asking questions.
user_annotation.not_released: This comment is not yet visible for students

user_question.conflict: The status of this question was already changed by another user
user_question.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
user_question.deleted: This question was deleted by another user
user_question.has_newer_submission: There was a newer submission since this question. Click here to go to the latest submission.
user_question.is_in_progress: This question is currently being answered.

js.violin_desc: This graph shows the distribution of the number of submissions. The larger the zone, the more students submitted that number of solutions. The dot indicates the average. When the average is larger than 20, the dot turns hollow.

sign_in_search_bar.institution_search: Typ om jouw school te vinden

js.stacked_desc: Deze grafiek geeft de verdeling van de oplossingsstatussen per oefening weer.
js.submission-emoji: Oeps, er ging iets fout bij het opslaan van je oplossing. Je oplossing bevat speciale tekens zoals emoji of wiskundige symbolen die je uit de opgave gekopieerd hebt. Verwijder deze en probeer opnieuw. Contacteer de assistent als je het probleem niet vindt.
js.submission-failed: Oeps, er ging iets fout bij het opslaan van je oplossing. Herlaad de pagina, probeer opnieuw, of contacteer de assistent.
js.submission-network: Oeps, we kunnen niet verbinden met de server. Controleer je internetverbinding.
js.submission-not-allowed: Oeps, je bent niet toegelaten om een oplossing in te dienen voor deze oefening.
js.submission-rate-limit: Oeps, je bent te snel! Wacht eventjes tussen het indienen van een nieuwe oplossing.
js.submission-too-long: Oeps, er ging iets fout bij het opslaan van je oplossing. Je oplossing is te lang. Maak ze korter en probeer opnieuw.

submission_motivational_message.1: 👾 Monsterprogrammeur! Je hebt die oefening helemaal verslonden!
submission_motivational_message.10: 🎯 In de roos! Met jouw programmeervaardigheden raak je altijd het doel!
submission_motivational_message.11: Fantastisch gedaan! Je hebt deze oefening onder de knie.
submission_motivational_message.12: 🤖 Beep boop! De robots zijn onder de indruk van jouw programmeerkunsten!
submission_motivational_message.14: 🔥 Je bent on fire! Ga zo door en je programmeerskills schieten omhoog!
submission_motivational_message.15: Voortreffelijk! Je hebt deze oefening goed aangepakt.
submission_motivational_message.16: Je bent echt goed in programmeren! Ga zo door.
submission_motivational_message.17: Perfect! Je hebt deze oefening helemaal correct opgelost.
submission_motivational_message.18: Prima werk! Je hebt deze oefening goed begrepen en opgelost.
submission_motivational_message.19: 🎸 Rock die code! Je speelt de sterren van de hemel met je programmeervaardigheden!
submission_motivational_message.2: 🚀 Super programmeur! Je hebt die oefening gelanceerd als een raket!
submission_motivational_message.20: Geweldige prestatie! Je hebt laten zien dat je een programmeertalent bent.
submission_motivational_message.3: 💡 Eureka! Je hebt het licht gezien en die oefening opgelost! Ga zo door!
submission_motivational_message.36: Bravo! Je hebt deze oefening tot een goed einde gebracht.
submission_motivational_message.4: 🌟 Schitterend! Je schittert als een ster in de programmeerhemel!
submission_motivational_message.5: 👍 Goed gedaan! Je hebt die oefening als een pro opgelost!
submission_motivational_message.6: 👏 Geweldig! Jij hebt deze oefening echt onder de knie!
submission_motivational_message.7: 🤩 Geweldig werk! Jij verdient een staande ovatie!
submission_motivational_message.8: 💻 Super coder! Je gaat door die oefeningen als een warm mes door de boter!
submission_motivational_message.9: Goed gedaan! Je hebt deze oefening met succes voltooid.

js.timeseries_desc: Deze grafiek toont op welke momenten het meest aan een bepaalde oefening werd gewerkt.
js.tutor-failed: Er ging iets fout bij het laden van de online python tutor
js.unknown-error-loading-feedback: Er is een onbekende fout opgetreden bij het laden van de feedback voor je oplossing

user_annotation.anonymous_message: Deze opmerking maakt deel uit van een evaluatie
user_annotation.delete_confirm: Ben je zeker dat je deze opmerking wil verwijderen?
user_annotation.help: Druk Shift + Enter om te verzenden. Markdown wordt ondersteund.
user_annotation.help_student: Onze handleiding bevat meer informatie over het stellen van vragen.
user_annotation.not_released: Deze opmerking is nog niet zichtbaar voor studenten

user_question.conflict: De status van deze vraag is al aangepast door een andere gebruiker
user_question.delete_confirm: Ben je zeker dat je deze vraag wilt verwijderen?
user_question.deleted: Deze vraag is verwijderd door een andere gebruiker
user_question.has_newer_submission: Er is een nieuwe oplosssing ingediend sinds deze vraag. Klik hier om naar de nieuwste oplossing te gaan.
user_question.is_unanswered: Deze vraag is nog niet beantwoord.

js.violin_desc: Deze grafiek geeft de verdeling weer van het aantal ingediende oplossingen. Hoe dikker de zone op de grafiek, hoe meer studenten dat aantal pogingen nodig had. Het bolletje geeft het gemiddelde aan. Wanneer het gemiddelde groter dan 20 is, wordt het bolletje hol.
